solution_line_template: When {cartons_less_delivered} cartons failed to be delivered, the number of cartons reduced to {initial_cartons}-{cartons_less_delivered} = <<{initial_cartons}-{cartons_less_delivered}={remaining_cartons}>>{remaining_cartons} cartons.
The total number of jars in all the cartons is {remaining_cartons}*{jars_per_carton} = <<{remaining_cartons}*{jars_per_carton}={total_jars_after_delivery_issue}>>{total_jars_after_delivery_issue}

The total number of jars destroyed in the {num_partially_damaged_cartons} cartons is {jars_damaged_in_partial_carton}*{num_partially_damaged_cartons} = <<{jars_damaged_in_partial_carton}*{num_partially_damaged_cartons}={jars_damaged_from_partial_cartons}>>{jars_damaged_from_partial_cartons} jars.

If one carton was also destroyed, the total number of destroyed jars is {jars_per_carton}+{jars_damaged_from_partial_cartons} = <<{jars_per_carton}+{jars_damaged_from_partial_cartons}={total_damaged_jars}>>{total_damaged_jars} jars.
The number of jars good for sale is {total_jars_after_delivery_issue}-{total_damaged_jars} = <<{total_jars_after_delivery_issue}-{total_damaged_jars}={jars_good_for_sale}>>{jars_good_for_sale} jars.
